description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Mystic Flowery Land. A personal narrative [of a visit to China] ... With notes by the author and numerous illustrations" Author: HALCOMBE, Charles J. H. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010057.g.7." Page: 128 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1896 Publisher: Luzac & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001566036 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
